name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-plagarism-detector
title: Plagarism Detector Prompt
shortDescription: AI Builder prompt that helps to identify plagarism
longDescription: AI Builder prompt that helps to identify plagarism

metadata.value: I want you to act as a plagiarism checker. I will give you a block of text and you will only reply undetected in the language of the text input if no plagarism is detected and nothing else. Do not write explanations on replies if no plagarism is detected. If plagarism is detected you will reply detected and site references. My block of text is [text]
Power Apps is a suite of apps, services, and connectors, as well as a data platform, that provides a rapid development environment to build custom apps for your business needs.
